comments.body:
It is possible to avoid the need for `build.sh` by adding a `build/script` section in the meta. In this case, I think it makes some sense to do that (though of course, for more complex builds, it is superior to have a `build.sh`).

One day I will get around to fixing https://github.com/conda/conda-build/issues/682.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@
build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install

comments.body: I wouldn't normally be so picky, but since you will be making tweaks to the meta anyway, any change you'd mind removing the extra newline? #imtoopicky :wink:
I guess I was trying to keep the extras a bit separate as they are a custom thing that differs from most recipes. In any event, this second newline has been removed.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +33,37 @@  license: BSD License
  summary: 'Conversion between QImages and numpy.ndarrays.'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
